column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Not as good as Cafe Iberico but closer to me and I always enjoy it.  It has the reputation of being touristy
column2: but I dont really care if the food is good
column3: and it is.   We love the garlic shrimp
column5: beef terderloin and spicy potatoes. The atmoshpere is lively and the prices are  moderate.   Im always stuffed and satisfied when I leave!
